Container.Name: ActualServer
Container.Overview: Actual is a local-first, open-source budgeting tool designed to be simple and user-friendly. It prioritizes privacy and security, with no trackers and no third-party access unless explicitly enabled. Actual is built on the principles of being sleek, clutter-free, stable, reliable, secure, privacy-focused, and community-driven. It offers a range of features including budgeting, scheduling, accounts & transactions, reports, and more. Actual is designed to be accessible across all devices, with a responsive interface that adapts to different screen sizes.
